lines.text:
[Parodying the witnesses reactions out of frustration]
"I don't know," "You don't know," It's funny. Nobody seems to know nothing! around here!
Hah! I wouldn't broadcast that if I were you, Oscar.

[Frustrated when it seems Cassidy can't remember anything]
You'll go a long ways... a long ways out in the sticks.

[Seeing a piece of evidence]
I saw this on Carter's desk this morning.
Sure, and it went in one eye and out the other.
Now don't behave more stupid than is natural, Oscar.
Oh, it was horrible, sir. Why, I thought...

[Interrupting impatiently]
Never mind what you thought. What'd you do?
Inspector, I have a feeling there's more to this case than meets the eye.
You say that about every case.
